title: Monitor going to sleep when i start playing on Fullscreen !! HELP
body:
I have an GT 420 2 GB VRAM / 4 GB RAM / Pentium E5700 3 GhZ / HP Monitor . 

So,i started playing LOL one year ago and i had no problem, i quit this game. And a few days ago i started playing it again. BUT , i have a problem, when i start playing on Fullscreen my Monitor Goes black and is keeping telling me this : "Monitor going to sleep" and i need to restart my PC ... But i still hear the sounds of the game. And this error happens just in LOL . I have no problems with the other games. And BTW one year ago when i first started playing LOL i had an AMD Radeon HD 4650 1 GB VRAM and i had no problem,but i needed to get this GT 420 because that AMD was overheating. So,to make the GT 420 compatible,i canged to VGA cable . And now i cant play on fullscreen . HELP !!!

replies.body:
That's an odd issue, and I'm curious if there is resolution mismatch or setting mess up causing this.  What happens if you hit Alt+Enter during this sleep mode?  If it puts you to a windowed mode but restores the game then your settings may be the culprit.  A config reset might fix this:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know how that goes for you.
